statements: SELECT * FROM patient_lab_test_results;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM patient_lab_test_results WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM patient_lab_test_results WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT test_name FROM patient_lab_test_results;
SELECT test_name, AVG(test_result) AS average_result FROM patient_lab_test_results GROUP BY test_name;
SELECT * FROM patient_lab_test_results WHERE patient_id = 1 ORDER BY test_date DESC
SELECT patient_id, test_name, test_result FROM patient_lab_test_results WHERE test_name LIKE '%blood%'
SELECT test_name, AVG(test_result) AS average_result FROM patient_lab_test_results GROUP BY test_name HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 1 ORDER BY average_result DESC
SELECT patient_id, test_date, test_result FROM patient_lab_test_results WHERE test_result > 100 ORDER BY patient_id ASC, test_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT test_name FROM patient_lab_test_results
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, test_name, test_result FROM patients JOIN lab_results ON patients.patient_id = lab_results.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, test_name, test_result FROM patients JOIN lab_results ON patients.patient_id = lab_results.patient_id ORDER BY test_result DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM lab_results WHERE test_result > 100 ORDER BY test_date ASC, test_name;
SELECT test_name, test_result, test_date FROM lab_results WHERE test_result < 50;
SELECT * FROM patient_information;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_information WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, location FROM patient_information WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, recommendation_text FROM patient_information JOIN recommendations ON patient_information.patient_id = recommendations.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_information ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC, patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, location FROM patient_information WHERE location='New York' AND gender='Female';

SELECT patient_information.patient_name, lab_tests.test_name, recommendations.recommendation_text FROM patient_information JOIN lab_tests ON patient_information.patient_id = lab_tests.patient_id JOIN recommendations ON patient_information.patient_id = recommendations.patient_id WHERE lab_tests.test_result > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, location FROM patient_information WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 AND location LIKE '%Hospital%';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS num_recommendations FROM recommendations GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_recommendations >= 3 ORDER BY num_recommendations DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM LabTests ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, location FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM Recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, location FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialization ASC;
SELECT patient_name, test_name, result_value FROM Patients JOIN LabTests ON Patients.patient_id = LabTests.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, recommendation_text FROM Doctors JOIN Recommendations ON Doctors.doctor_id = Recommendations.doctor_id WHERE recommendation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_date, result FROM lab_tests WHERE result='Negative';
SELECT doctor_name FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id = 2;
SELECT patient_name, recommendation_text FROM patients JOIN recommendations ON patients.patient_id = recommendations.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patients.patient_name, lab_tests.test_name FROM patients INNER JOIN lab_tests ON patients.patient_id = lab_tests.patient_id;

SELECT doctors.doctor_name, lab_tests.test_name, test_results.result_value FROM doctors INNER JOIN lab_tests ON doctors.doctor_id = lab_tests.patient_id INNER JOIN test_results ON lab_tests.test_id = test_results.test_id;

SELECT patients.patient_name, lab_tests.test_date, test_results.result_value FROM patients JOIN lab_tests ON patients.patient_id = lab_tests.patient_id JOIN test_results ON lab_tests.test_id = test_results.test_id WHERE test_results.result_value LIKE '%positive%';
